Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Potion = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso
Tool.Enabled = true
local potionSound
local fireHand = Instance.new("Part") fireHand.Size = Vector3.new(1, 2, 1) fireHand.Shape = "Block" fireHand.FormFactor = 3 fireHand.CanCollide = false fireHand.Transparency = 1.0
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(139/255, 0, 139/255) fire.Heat = 1.0 fire.Size = 1.0 fire.Parent = fireHand
local leftClone local rightClone local w1 local w2
local damage = 15
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function blow(parent, hit) if parent then if hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Name = "creator" creator.Value = player creator.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or rightArm == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end wait(0.75) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 24.0 Potion.Transparency = 1.0 leftClone = fireHand:Clone() leftClone.Parent = vCharacter leftClone.Name = "FireLeftArm" leftClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(leftClone, hit) end)
w1 = Instance.new("Weld") w1.Parent = leftClone w1.Part0 = leftArm w1.Part1 = leftClone w1.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 1, 0))
rightClone = fireHand:Clone() rightClone.Parent = vCharacter rightClone.Name = "FireRightArm" rightClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(rightClone, hit) end)
w2 = Instance.new("Weld") w2.Parent = rightClone w2.Part0 = rightArm w2.Part1 = rightClone w2.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 1, 0))
wait(12.0) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 Potion.Transparency = 0.0 if w1 then w1:Remove() end if w2 then w2:Remove() end wait(5.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if potionSound then potionSound:Stop() end Potion.Transparency = 0.0 if w1 then w1:Remove() end if w2 then w2:Remove() end if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Potion = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid
local potionAnim
function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end potionAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.PotionAnim) if potionAnim then potionAnim:Play() end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
function onUnequipped() if potionAnim then potionAnim:Play() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
